title: Hero Selection displays career options correctly
description: Verify that the Hero Selection screen loads successfully and displays all three career path options: Data Engineer, Data Scientist, and BI Analyst.

steps.description: Navigate to the Hero Selection screen.
Check that the screen displays Data Engineer, Data Scientist, and BI Analyst options.
Ensure that each career option is selectable.

title: Hero Selection records user choice correctly
description: Verify that when a user selects a career path, the selection is recorded accurately and the user progresses to the Path Selection screen.

steps.description: Select each career path option one by one.
Confirm the system records the selected career path.
Verify navigation to Path Selection screen occurs after selection.

title: Path Selection displays Technical and Behavioral tracks
description: Verify that the Path Selection screen presents two distinct options: Technical Mastery and Soft Skills & Leadership (Behavioral).

steps.description: Navigate to the Path Selection screen after selecting a career path.
Check that Technical Mastery and Soft Skills & Leadership are displayed as options.
Verify that each option is selectable.

title: Path Selection records user choice correctly
description: Verify that the user's selected path (Technical or Behavioral) is saved correctly and reflected in subsequent game availability.

steps.description: Select Technical Mastery path.
Confirm the selected path is recorded.
Repeat for Soft Skills & Leadership path.
Verify navigation to Career Map screen after path selection.

title: Career Map loads and displays unlocked levels accurately
description: Verify that the Career Map screen loads correctly and shows the unlocked levels corresponding to the user's progress, without errors or visual glitches.

steps.description: Navigate to the Career Map screen after selecting career path and path type.
Check that the unlocked levels are visually distinct and correctly represented on the winding map.
Verify that locked levels are appropriately hidden or marked as locked.

title: User progress is updated and saved after completing games
description: Verify that after completing a game, the user's progress is saved and reflected immediately in the Career Map unlocking subsequent levels or features.

steps.description: Play and complete a game corresponding to the selected career path and track.
Check that the Career Map updates to show newly unlocked levels.
Confirm that progress persists after page reload or logout/login.

title: Story Modal shows mission briefing before games
description: Verify that the Story Modal system displays clear educational mission briefings before each game starts, corresponding to the specific game and career path.

steps.description: Select a game from the Career Map to start.
Verify the Story Modal appears with mission briefing content relevant to the game.
Dismiss the briefing and start the game.

title: Story Modal shows impact report after game completion
description: Verify that upon completing a game, the Story Modal appears showing an impact report summarizing user performance and learning outcomes in clear language.

steps.description: Complete a game successfully.
Confirm that the Story Modal debrief is displayed with relevant impact report content.
Acknowledge the report and confirm return to Career Map.

title: Pipeline Puzzle Game mechanics function correctly
description: Verify the Pipeline Puzzle Game loads correctly and allows users to connect data pipeline components in the proper sequence, enforcing game logic and rules.

steps.description: Navigate to and launch the Pipeline Puzzle Game.
Check that all required pipeline components are available and draggable/selectable.
Attempt connecting pipeline components in correct and incorrect sequences.
Confirm that correct sequences are accepted and incorrect sequences are rejected with appropriate feedback.

title: Null Runner Game collects signals and avoids noise
description: Verify that the Null Runner Action Game loads correctly, and players can collect beneficial signals while avoiding noise, with correct scoring and game behavior.

steps.description: Launch the Null Runner Game.
Verify the game interface shows lanes with signals (green) and noise (red) objects.
Simulate player input to collect signals and avoid noise.
Confirm that signals increase score and noise causes penalties or game failure.

title: Query Master Game builds SQL queries correctly
description: Verify that the Query Master Word Puzzle Game loads properly and allows players to build syntactically correct SQL queries by selecting the correct blocks.

steps.description: Start the Query Master Game.
Verify that puzzle blocks are displayed and selectable.
Select blocks to form valid and invalid SQL queries.
Confirm the game validates queries and provides feedback on correctness.

title: Data Farm Idle Game operates as expected
description: Verify that the Data Farm Idle Game loads and allows planting and harvesting data plots correctly to achieve target goals with appropriate UI updates.

steps.description: Launch the Data Farm Game.
Check that planting and harvesting controls are responsive.
Plant plots and wait for harvest readiness.
Verify harvesting updates progress towards target correctly.

title: Server Guardian Tower Defense mechanics function correctly
description: Verify that the Server Guardian Game loads correctly and players can strategically deploy defenses to protect the database from bugs with appropriate game feedback.

steps.description: Start the Server Guardian Game.
Verify deployment options for defenses are available.
Deploy defenses and monitor game response to bugs.
Confirm that defenses effectively protect the database and bugs cause failures if defenses are inadequate.

title: Behavioral RPG Scenario Game handles decision flow correctly
description: Verify the Behavioral Game loads and allows players to make choice decisions in professional workplace scenarios, impacting soft skills and leadership progress.

steps.description: Launch the Behavioral Game.
Verify scenario descriptions and choice options are displayed.
Select different decision options and observe outcome.
Confirm that choices affect progress metrics and game flow logically.

title: UI consistency and responsiveness across devices
description: Verify that the UI is consistent, responsive, and accessible across supported devices (desktop, tablet, mobile) and varying screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the platform on different devices and screen sizes.
Confirm UI elements scale properly and remain fully functional.
Check accessibility features such as keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

title: API endpoints respond within acceptable time and handle errors gracefully
description: Verify that all API endpoints for screens and game interactions respond within expected time thresholds and provide meaningful error messages for invalid inputs or failures.

steps.description: Send valid requests to each API endpoint.
Confirm responses are received within acceptable latency and contain correct data.
Send invalid or malformed requests to each endpoint.
Verify that the system returns appropriate error codes and messages without crashes.

title: Error handling for invalid game inputs and unexpected user actions
description: Verify that the platform gracefully handles invalid inputs, abrupt user exits, or unexpected actions inside games without crashing or corrupting user progress.

steps.description: Attempt invalid game moves or inputs in each game.
Confirm appropriate validation messages or feedback is displayed.
Abort games mid-play by navigating away or closing the app.
Verify user progress is preserved and no data corruption occurs.

title: Edge case: No career path selected and user attempts to proceed
description: Verify the system prevents users from progressing without selecting a career path on the Hero Selection screen.

steps.description: Attempt to proceed to Path Selection screen without selecting a career path.
Confirm the system does not allow progression and displays an appropriate warning.

title: Edge case: No path selected and user attempts to proceed
description: Verify the system prevents users from proceeding without making a path selection on the Path Selection screen.

steps.description: Attempt to proceed from Path Selection to Career Map without selecting a path.
Confirm the system blocks progression and prompts the user to select a path.

title: Edge case: Career Map shows correct state after data corruption attempt
description: Test that the Career Map recovers gracefully or warns the user if underlying saved progress data is corrupted or missing.

steps.description: Simulate corrupted or missing progress data.
Verify that the Career Map handles the scenario without crashing and provides user guidance.
